ARABIC: فَأَنشَأْنَا لَكُم بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَٰبٍ لَّكُمْ فِيهَا فَوَٰكِهُ كَثِيرَةٌ وَمِنْهَا تَأْكُلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: By means of it We produce gardens of dates and grapes for you, in which there are many fruits for you and from which you eat,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We grow orchards of dates and grapes from it for you, Which yield fruits in abundance that you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then through water We caused gardens of date-palms and vines to grow for you wherein you have an abundance of delicious fruits and from them you derive your livelihood.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have established for you gardens of palm trees and vineyards with this water with many fruits for you to consume.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So with it We produced gardens of date-palms and grapes for you, in which is abundant fruit for you and you eat therefrom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then We brought forth for you therewith gardens of date palms and grapes, wherein is much fruit for you, and whereof you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We cause to grow thereby gardens of palm trees and grapes for you; you have in them many fruits and from them do you eat;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then We produced for you therewith gardens of palms and vines wherein are many fruits for you, and of them you eat,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then We produce for you therewith gardens of date-palms and grapes, wherein is much fruit for you and whereof ye eat;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have produced palm-groves and vineyards for you, in which there are abundant fruits for you; and you eat these,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We brought forth for you therewith gardens of date- palm and vines; for you therein are fruits many, and thereof ye eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then with it We produced for you gardens of date palms and vines. There are abundant fruits in them for you, and you eat from them,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: With it We grow for you gardens of date-palms and vines: in them have ye abundant fruits: and of them ye eat (and have enjoyment),-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then We brought forth for you therewith gardens of date-palms and grapes, wherein is much fruit for you, and whereof you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: With it, We produced for you gardens of palms and vines, yielding abundant fruit for you to eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: With it We produce for you gardens of palms and vines, yielding abundant fruit for you to eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We brought forth for you thereby gardens of palm trees and grapevines in which for you are abundant fruits and from which you eat.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:19] Then We produced for you therewith gardens of date palms and vines — these being the most common fruits of the Arabs — wherein is abundant fruit for you, and whereof you eat, in summer and winter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then We produce for you therewith) by means of water (gardens of date-palms and grapes, wherein) in the gardens (is much fruit) many kinds of fruit (for you and whereof) and of these kinds of fruit (ye eat;
